actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Pell without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 767.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution relating to hostilities between the Republics of Armenia and Azerbaijan.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the Republics of Armenia and Azerbaijan should immediately cease all hostilities and abide by the ceasefire resolution of September 19, 1992; and (2) failing an immediate cessation of hostilities, the United Nations (UN) Security Council should meet to address the situation in Nagorno-Karabakh and should authorize the Secretary-General to take appropriate steps to bring an end to the conflict, including, if necessary, the use of UN peacekeepers.

titles.title: A resolution relating to hostilities between the Republics of Armenia and Azerbaijan.
